# List All Promoted Purchases for an App

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get a list of promoted in-app purchases, including promoted auto-renewable subscriptions, for an app.

## Discussion

### Example Request and Response



## Getting in-app purchase information

- **Read In-App Purchase Information**: Get information about an in-app purchase.
- **List All In-App Purchases for an App V1**: List the in-app purchases that are available for your app.
